title: Undergraduate Academic Advising  · Angelo State University
description: Angelo State University encourages you to attend an advising session to ensure that you are taking courses that will allow you to progress toward graduation.

headings: Archer College of Health and Human Services
paragraphs: Angelo State University encourages you to attend an advising session to ensure that you are taking courses that will allow you to progress toward graduation.
Remember to follow thesteps for registrationschedule so that you can register for classes as early as possible.
Advising Frequently Asked Questions
Find Your Undergraduate Advisor
Students withover 45 hoursshould email thedepartmentchair in their major.
Select your college to learn about the specific advising instructions that pertain to you.
Advising is critical for all students in academic programs in the Archer College of Health and Human Services.
Visit theArcher College of Health and Human Serviceswebsite for more information.
Students will receive an email invitation from their advisor to schedule their appointment through Navigate prior to Fall and Spring pre-registration.
College of Arts and Humanities Advisors are available 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Monday-Friday, in Room 302 of thePorter Henderson Library.
Visit theFind Your Advisorpage to contact the specific advisor for your major.
College of Education students, including transfer students, regardless of hours, should contact their professional advisor.
Visit theCollege of Educationwebsite for more information.

If you havefewer than 46 earned semester credit hours, you will work with an advisor who specializes in your major. Students will receive an email invitation from their advisor to schedule their appointment through Navigate.
College of Science and Engineering Advisors are available 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Monday-Friday, in Room 302 of thePorter Henderson Library.
Visit theFind Your Advisorpage to contact the specific advisor for your major.
Norris-Vincent College of Business students, including transfer students, regardless of hours, should contact their professional advisor.
Visit the Norris-Vincent College of BusinessCenter for Student Successfor more information.
Students that choose Undeclared are required to select an Exploratory Track. Visit theUndeclared Advisingpage for more information.
Are you unsure who you should contact about setting up an advising appointment? We’re here to help!
